sentences.en: A conscientious teacher may feel inclined to take work home.
sentences.cn: 一个认真负责的教师可能会想着把工作带回家去做。

sentences.en: Be conscientious and make a good job of publication.
Be conscientious and make a good job of publishing.
He has always been a conscientious worker.
He is a conscientious man and knows his job.
sentences.cn: 他很认真负责,也很懂行.

sentences.en: He is conscientious and diligent , and is never idle.
sentences.cn: 他是个勤谨人, 整天闲不住.

sentences.en: He is very conscientious in the performance of his duties.
sentences.cn: 他非常认真地履行职责.

sentences.en: He was quiet, conscientious, a bit of a plodder.
sentences.cn: 他做事闷声不响，小心谨慎，有点死气沉沉的。

sentences.en: I know you've been a conscientious worker , content with your lot and not giving any trouble.
sentences.cn: 我知道你是个好人, 你是安分守己的.

sentences.en: I should like to own myself a conscientious objector.
sentences.cn: 我愿意坦承自己是良心上的拒服兵役者.

sentences.en: She is very conscientious and never skimps her work.
sentences.cn: 她办事认真,从不敷衍了事.

sentences.en: The conscientious researcher is careful to avoid up the pole and omission.
sentences.cn: 那位一丝不苟的研究人员总是小心谨慎地避免错误或疏漏.

sentences.en: This guy is really conscientious in his work.
To give the devil his due , he is quite a conscientious worker.
sentences.cn: 平心而论, 他工作还是认真的.

sentences.en: Virginia was still struggling to be a conscientious and dedicated mother.
sentences.cn: 弗吉尼娅还在尽力成为一位勤勤恳恳、全心奉献的母亲。

trans.tran_en: careful to do everything that it is your job or duty to do
